item.description:
On Thursdays, a group of us gets together for breakfast and a hike. Sometimes we hike in Myles Standish. Sometimes we go on one of the AMC hikes. Sometimes we just eat breakfast when it's pouring.

This week the AMC has a wonderful hike out at the National Seashore.

Walk vast/historic marsh...a Cape Cod gem...great views. Rte 6 Eastham, R on Gov Prence Rd, R on Fort Hill Rd to 1st pk lot on left. Meet PROMPTLY 9:45 to carpool to Salt Pond Visitor Ctr. 2 hrs, bad weather? call leader.

Breakfast at 8:30 before hand if you can make it at the Fairway Restaurant which is on Route 6 in Eastham. Directions to the Fairway Restaurant

group.name: Friends of Myles Standish State Forest Meetup Group

item.name: Thursday Hiking Club-- Goes to the National Seashore
